creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: If I were a landscape painter, this is the scene I would paint to capture the essence of our failed state.
title: May 25, 2020: Fig. 63 A Failed State.
